::Rust::

Rust turns to look at Whistler. "Every soldier counts! If you can't 
fight, you can distract the enemy, or alert the troops. It is your 
duty to the .. uh ... the faction! Activate your internal repairs, 
and fare your best!"

He turns around again, marching off.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Whistler::
>     "What am I going to do claw them to death?  I can't walk 
straight much 
> less fight."
